docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: index

methods.name: show

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
GET /api/subnets/980190962-one
200
{
  "network": "2.3.4.0",
  "cidr": 24,
  "mask": "255.255.255.0",
  "priority": null,

methods.name: create

params.name: ipam
params.description: IP Address auto suggestion mode for this subnet, valid values are “DHCP”, “Internal DB”, “None”

params.name: from
params.description: Starting IP Address for IP auto suggestion

params.name: to
params.description: Ending IP Address for IP auto suggestion

params.name: domain_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: dhcp_id
params.description: DHCP Proxy to use within this subnet

params.name: tftp_id
params.description: TFTP Proxy to use within this subnet

params.name: dns_id
params.description: DNS Proxy to use within this subnet

params.name: boot_mode
params.description: Default boot mode for interfaces assigned to this subnet, valid values are “Static”, “DHCP”

params.name: location_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: organization_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

examples:
POST /api/subnets
{
  "subnet": {
    "name": "QA2",
    "network": "10.35.2.27",
    "mask": "255.255.255.0"
  }
}
201
{
  "network": "10.35.2.27",
  "cidr": 24,
  "mask": "255.255.255.0",

methods.name: update

params.name: ipam
params.description: IP Address auto suggestion mode for this subnet, valid values are “DHCP”, “Internal DB”, “None”

params.name: from
params.description: Starting IP Address for IP auto suggestion

params.name: to
params.description: Ending IP Address for IP auto suggestion

params.name: domain_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: dhcp_id
params.description: DHCP Proxy to use within this subnet

params.name: tftp_id
params.description: TFTP Proxy to use within this subnet

params.name: dns_id
params.description: DNS Proxy to use within this subnet

params.name: boot_mode
params.description: Default boot mode for interfaces assigned to this subnet, valid values are “Static”, “DHCP”

params.name: location_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: organization_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

methods.name: destroy
examples:
DELETE /api/subnets/281110143-four
